member.name: M:SiliconStudio.Core.NativeLibrary.PreloadLibrary(System.String)
member.summary: Try to preload the library. This is useful when we want to have AnyCPU .NET and CPU-specific native code. Only available on Windows for now.

member.name: M:SiliconStudio.Core.NativeLibrary.UnLoad(System.String)
member.summary: UnLoad a specific native dynamic library loaded previously by .
member.param: Name of the library to unload.

member.name: M:SiliconStudio.Core.NativeLibrary.UnLoadAll
member.summary: UnLoad all native dynamic library loaded previously by .

member.name: T:SiliconStudio.Core.NativeLibraryInternal
member.summary: Internally this file is used by the ExecServer project in order to copy native dlls to shadow copy folders.
